title: Crashed in game now cant get back in
body:
So my internet is working just fine, there was no lag, no ping spike no nothing. Just immediately out of the blue attempting to reconnect sign and i cant get back in now. This happen to anyone else?

Edit: Its still going on, client is still stuck on reconnect option for almost 3 hours now no matter how many times i relog. Getting really upset about it.

replies.body: Were you in my match Incendia? Several of the people on my team ended up just leaving and playing on other accounts since we're all still locked into the reconnect to game even though it should clearly be over by now.
was there a top lane jayce who wasnt just new to rank, but new to pvp entirely, who fed and decided to blame the jungler? If not then no i wasnt in your game

Are you still experiencing this issue?  It sounds like you were faced with a network issue that's preventing a connection to your game server specifically.  If this is continues to happen, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help get that fixed up.  

It also sounds like you couldn't communicate the end of the match to the server, which would result in you seeing the reconnect screen even though it was finished.  This is sometimes known as a ghost game.  For this, relogging can force that communication.  Otherwise, you may need to wait it out.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
It has gone away now, and im able to play again. I was playing another game for a bit then came back to check again and its all good now

What if I'm experiencing this issue but have already tried relogging?
I managed to talk to several of my teammates in the game that I was stuck reconnecting to and they were experiencing the same issue.
We're under the impression that everyone in that particular game was suffering from this issue.

I looked at your games as well as Incendia's and I believe your matches have either not been recorded yet or saved.  The last match I see for you is yesterday with Riven.  Once the ghost game has been updated by the server to end, we'll know for sure if it saves or not.  If relogging doesn't work, the only other step is to wait it out until that communication is sent.  Ghost games can happen very rarely, but if it does I know it's not fun for anyone.  Hang tight!

For this "ghost game", it is my promotion series. Will it count as a loss forgiven after the communication is sent? I would hate to lose a promo match because I ended up logging off of that account while the match is "still reconnecting".

If it does end up as a true ghost game, then the match wouldn't have been recorded to the server.  Meaning, it shouldn't count towards your series.  

Regarding loss prevention in general, this is something that's only usually turned on for widespread issues that effect many players.  In this case, the incident looks isolated.  

Hope that helps offer some relief!
I was just messing around in a norm I don't care about the loss. Would just like to play lol.
well op.gg no longer sees me as in game...but my league client still does
Yo the same thing happened to me. Did you figure it out?
nope, still just sitting here...better get lost forgiven for it though. Id get demoted if i lost that one
Just keeps trying to make me reconnect, this game has to be over.
